description:
bulkv2 upsert records from a CSV file
Inserts or updates records from a CSV file.

flags.sobjecttype: the sObject type of the records you want to upsert
flags.csvfile: the path to the CSV file that defines the records to upsert
flags.externalid: the column name of the external ID

sfdx force:data:bulkv2:status -i %s
